pullrequest.title: Use build failer analyser for more descriptive error mails

pull_request.title: Use build failer analyser for more descriptive error mails

update.description:
The build farm implement the library (Build Failer Analyser) for identifying problems in jenkins build jobs and report the detailed information and direct links to errors in the jenkins mails. Hopefully this can speed up our time accessing to what's wrong when something fail.

An example of a mail using the new setup:

```
gnition_msgs-ci-default-wily-amd64 - Build # 14 - Failure:

Identified problems:
* Failed to install some packages: There was a problem installing some packages, if the problem is persistent it could be a bug in the testing infrastructure.
  * Indication 1:
    <http://build.osrfoundation.org//job/ignition_msgs-ci-default-wily-amd64/14/consoleFull#-1850710222916f16c6-32f6-4563-8cf6-e0491cbe9323>


Full log: http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-ci-default-wily-amd64/14//14/consoleFull
Retry   : http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-ci-default-wily-amd64/14//14/retry



Test summary:
-------------
 * Total of  tests :  failed and

Data log:
No tests ran.
```
update.title: Use build failer analyser for more descriptive error mails
